title: Analysis of the Impact of Post-Pandemic Online and Blended Learning Modalities on Learner Satisfaction

context.prior_knowledge: Experience with traditional teaching methods and basic proficiency in digital device utilization
context.additional_context: A short intensive course analyzing the effectiveness of technology-supported online and blended teaching methods in mobile-based microlearning environments for pre-service and in-service language teachers.

learning_goals: The impact of pandemic-driven changes in educational methods on learner satisfaction can be explained through data analysis.
The advantages and disadvantages of technology-supported online and blended learning methods can be compared and applied according to learner characteristics.
Practical educational models can be proposed by deriving improvement strategies for educational methods and conducting project-based assessments.

resources: Comparative Case Study of Educational Approaches

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
